title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Effectiveness Through High-Fidelity Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on practical opportunities for students lacking field experience through smartphone-based simulation tools.

learning_goals: Perform three or more critical care emergency response protocols with 90% accuracy in a high-fidelity simulation environment
Improve team collaboration skills by 20% through peer evaluation after simulation-based learning
Incorporate three or more critical thinking elements when writing self-reflection reports after simulation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
